text: Brigham Young is a 1940 American romantic adventure drama movie directed by Henry Hathaway and starring Tyrone Power, Linda Darnell, Dean Jagger, Brian Donlevy, Jane Darwell, John Carradine, Mary Astor, Vincent Prince, Ann E. Todd, Moroni Olsen. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Plot == In frontier-town Nauvoo, Illinois in 1844, the main body of the church are forced to leave Illinois, choosing to settle temporarily in Nebraska. They then to travel by wagon train to the Great Basin. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940 adventure movies Category:1940 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Hathaway Category:Movies set in Illinois Category:Movies set in Iowa Category:Movies set in Utah Category:Movies set in the 1840s
title: Brigham Young (movie)
